genresAdvancedInfo.name: norwegian hardcore
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Norwegian hardcore is a subgenre of punk rock that emphasizes fast, aggressive music and politically charged lyrics. The music is often characterized by distorted guitar riffs, pounding drums, and shouted vocals. Norwegian hardcore bands often address social issues such as inequality and environmentalism in their music.
